Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIController

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that acts as the game controller. It controls the in-game state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.google.gson.Gson gson
      The GSON instance, used to create JSON messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController(HanabiClient parent)
        A constructor for the Game Controller. It will instantiate gson and patent. The constructor will also set up the model, view, and interaction model.
        Parameters:
        parent - A reference to the Hanabi Client that this Game Controller is linked to.

        public java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,com.google.gson.JsonElement>> parseJSON(java.lang.String jsonMessage)
        A function that will parse incoming JSON messages into a collection of usable and interpretable information.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        return a parsed message map.
